  <thead>
    <tr>
{{{headers|      <th scope="col">Year</th>

== Template:ChartsCss pie multiple ==
Renders a Charts.css multi-dataset pie chart table (`pie multiple`) and loads the stylesheet.

This is useful when each row has multiple pie segments (multiple `<td>` cells).

=== Parameters ===
* `classes` (optional): additional Charts.css classes, e.g. `show-labels show-data-on-hover show-primary-axis show-data-axes`
* `caption` (optional): table caption
* `headers` (optional): raw `<th>...</th>` markup for the header row (for full control)
* `rows`: wikitext that expands to one or more rows (typically via `Template:ChartsCss pie row`)

=== Example ===
<pre>
{{ChartsCss pie multiple
 | classes=show-labels show-data-on-hover show-primary-axis show-data-axes
 | caption=Chart Heading
 | headers=
   <th scope="col">Year</th>
   <th scope="col">Progress 1</th>
   <th scope="col">Progress 2</th>
   <th scope="col">Progress 3</th>
 | rows=
   {{ChartsCss pie row | label=2000 | cells=
     {{ChartsCss pie cell | start=0.1 | end=0.5 | data=50 }}
     {{ChartsCss pie cell | start=0.0 | end=0.2 | data=20 }}
     {{ChartsCss pie cell | start=0.2 | end=0.4 | data=40 }}
   }}
   {{ChartsCss pie row | label=2010 | cells=
     {{ChartsCss pie cell | start=0.5 | end=0.8 | data=80 }}
     {{ChartsCss pie cell | start=0.2 | end=0.5 | data=50 }}
     {{ChartsCss pie cell | start=0.4 | end=0.1 | data=10 }}
   }}
}}
</pre>

Notes:
* Each `ChartsCss pie cell` uses `--start`/`--end` in the `0.0`..`1.0` range.
</noinclude>
